# Input

**API Collection**

Receive controller input in the way that best integrates with the flow of your game or game engine.

## Essentials

- **Handling input events**: Receive controller input using either polling or callbacks.
- **GCDevicePhysicalInput**: The common properties and methods for objects that represent the input profile of a device.
- **GCDevicePhysicalInputState**: The common properties for physical devices with elements.
- **GCDevicePhysicalInputStateDiff**: The common functions for objects that contain the differences between a current and previous input state object.

## Elements

- **GCPhysicalInputElementCollection**: A collection of physical input elements.
- **GCPhysicalInputElement**: The common properties of physical input elements.
- **GCButtonElement**: The common properties of an element that represents a momentary switch, such as a push button.
- **GCAxisElement**: The common properties for an element that represents an absolute or relative input value along an axis.
- **GCSwitchElement**: The common properties for an element that represents a switch.
- **GCDirectionPadElement**: The common properties of elements that represent directional pads.

## Element inputs

- **GCPhysicalInputSource**: A protocol for a description of an element without any system-level remapping of the controls.

## Element names

- **GCPhysicalInputElementName**: The name of a physical input element.
- **GCPhysicalInputElementTypedName**: A type-safe name for accessing elements of a physical input element collection.
- **GCButtonElementName**: The names of the button elements.
- **GCAxisElementName**: The names for the elements that provide values along an axis.
- **GCSwitchElementName**: The name for an element that represents a switch.
- **GCDirectionPadElementName**: The names for directional pad elements.
- **Extended gamepad input names**: Constants for names of extended gamepad elements.
- **DualShock controller input names**: Constants for names of DualShock 4 elements.
- **Xbox controller input names**: Constants for names of Xbox elements.
- **Micro gamepad input names**: Constants for names of micro gamepad elements.
- **Directional Gamepad Input Names**: Constants for names of directional pad elements.

## Game controller profiles

- **GCMotion**: A controller profile that supports orientation and motion.
- **GCDeviceBattery**: The charge level and state of a device’s battery.
- **GCDeviceHaptics**: The locations of haptic actuators on a game controller.
- **GCDeviceLight**: The colored light on a device.
